title: Ticket #1657: Update condor's installer to use WiX
description:
Ticket to track work/progress on WiX port of installer.

modifications will be made on: V7_5-cmake-stage-publicbranch
remarks:
2010-Sep-22 10:06:57 by tstclair:
PATCH to ...Modules\CPackWiX.cmake

I will update all files referenced in wiki. 

IF ( CPACK_WIX_WXS_FILES )

        foreach ( _ITEM ${CPACK_WIX_WXS_FILES} )
		#get just the file name which will be used for compiled .wxs objects
		string(REGEX MATCH "[^/]*$" _wxs_file "${_ITEM}")
		if (NOT CPACK_WIX_OBJS)
			set (CPACK_WIX_OBJS ${_wxs_file})
		else ()
			set (CPACK_WIX_OBJS "${CPACK_WIX_OBJS} ${_wxs_file}")
		endif()
	endforeach(_ITEM)

        # transform to compatible input to command line utils
	string(REPLACE ".wxs" ".wixobj" CPACK_WIX_OBJS "${CPACK_WIX_OBJS}" )
	string(REPLACE ";" " " CPACK_WIX_OBJS "${CPACK_WIX_OBJS}" )
	# cmake list -> " " for command line input
	string(REPLACE ";" " " CPACK_WIX_WXS_FILES "${CPACK_WIX_WXS_FILES}" )

ENDIF( CPACK_WIX_WXS_FILES )

2010-Nov-21 21:34:40 by tstclair:
I'm going to be reviewing all the recent mods.

2010-Nov-23 09:51:02 by tstclair:
There appears to be a config issue. If it's possible to make ifThenElse blocks in the generic config that would solve this problem. Otherwise we will need to provide a generic windows config.

2011-Jan-25 14:42:18 by ziliang:
TODO: * Investigate why the estimated disk space usage is so inflated. * Create a separate dialog chain for upgrades. * Persist installation answers for future usage for upgrade purposes. * Stuff registry for kbdd startup. Currently kbdd itself acts as a failsafe and will do the registry stuffing itself if need be. * Punch hole for condor_hdfs in installer. Doesn't matter for 7.5.5 since condor_hdfs doesn't work anyway on Windows in that version.
